original: Bhagavati pavattāvāti idaṃ yebhuyyena upamānopameyyatthānaṃ bhinnādhāratāya bhinnādhārassa
analyzed: bhagavati idam yebhuyyena upamāna upameyya tthānam bhinna ādhāra tāya bhinna ādhārassa

original: ca upamānatthassa idha asambhavato vuttaṃ. Bhagavato karuṇāya aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvo
analyzed: ca upamāna atthassa idha asambhavataḥ vuttam bhagavataḥ karuṇāya aññehi asādhāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: satte saṃsāradukkhato uddharitvā accantasukhe nibbāne patiṭṭhapetuṃ attano sarīrajīvitapariccāgenapi
analyzed: satte saṃsāra dukkhataḥ uddharitvā accanta sukhe nibbāne patiṭṭhapetum attano sarīra jīvita pariccāgena pi

original: ekantahitajjhāsayatāvasena veditabbo, yato vineyyānaṃ kosohitavatthaguyhapahūtajivhāvidaṃsanampi
analyzed: ekanta hita jhāsaya tā vasena veditabbaḥ yatas vineyyānam

original: kataṃ, yañca yadime sattā jāneyyuṃ, bhagavato sāsanena rahadamiva sītalaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
analyzed: katam yat ca yat ime sattāḥ jāneyyum bhagavatoḥ sāsanena rahadam iva sītalam sampad jalitam

original: aggikkhandhampi samogāheyya. Aññesaṃ passantānanti sambandho. Uddhaṭāti padaṃ apekkhitvā
analyzed: aggi kkhandham pi samogāheyya aññesam passantānam ti sambandho padam apekkhitvā

original: mahoghapakkhandānaṃ sattānanti kammatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – kāmādimahoghapakkhande
analyzed: mahogha pakkhandānam sattānam ti kamma atthe sāmi vacanam ayan ha ittha saṅkhepa atthaḥ kāma ādi mahogha pakkhande

original: satte tato uddhaṭā natthañño koci maṃ ṭhapetvāti passato yathā bhagavato karuṇāya
analyzed: satte tatas uddhaṭā koci mam ṭhapetvā ati passataḥ yathā bhagavataḥ karuṇāya

original: āvisanaṃ hoti, na evaṃ aññesaṃ tathādassanasseva abhāvato. Atha vā aññesaṃ passantānanti
analyzed: āvisanam hoti na evam aññesam tathā dassanassa iva abhāvataḥ atha vā aññesam passantānanti

original: yadipi pare passeyyuṃ, tathāpi na tesaṃ bhagavato viya karuṇokkamanaṃ atthi appaṭipattito
analyzed: yadi api pare passeyyum tathā api na tesam bhagavataḥ viya karuṇā ukkamanam atthi appaṭipattito

original: attahitamattapaṭipattito cāti attho.
analyzed: ca ati attho

original: Anāvaraṇā tīsu kālesu sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya, asādhāraṇā sabbadhammānaṃ niravasesahetupaccayapariggahavasena
analyzed: anāvaraṇā tīsu kālesu sabbattha appaṭihata vutti tāya asādhāraṇā sabba dhammānam niravasesa hetu paccaya pariggaha vasena

analyzed: tesam ca sabhāva kicca ādi avatthā avisesa ādi parijānanena āyūhana velāyam eva taṃ taṃ kammānam

original: ca atisukhumatirohitavidūravuttiatītānāgatādibhedabhinnānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃkāraṇasamavāyavibhāvaneneva

original: taṃtaṃphalesu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandharasaphassādivisesassa niravasesato paṭivijjhanena

analyzed: veditabbā ayam ca atthaḥ bhagavataḥ aneka dhātu nānā dhātu lokam yathābhūtam ñāṇa ādi vasena

analyzed: veditabbaḥ yathā ca passantassa ati idam rāgaggi ādīhi loka sannivāsassa

analyzed: bhagavataḥ mahā karuṇā ukkamana upāyam sandhāya vuttam tam pana bahukehi ākārehi passantānam

analyzed: buddhānam bhagavantānam sattesu mahā karuṇā okkamati ādittaḥ loka sannivāsa upe uyyutta upe

original: paṭisambhidāmagge mahākaruṇāñāṇavibhaṅgavasena jānitabba”nti. Indriyaparopariyattaāsayānusaya

original: saṅgaho katoti veditabbo.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ kataḥ iti veditabbaḥ

original: Nippadesasappadesavisayā karuṇā viya bhagavato paññāpi idha nippadesasappadesavisayā

analyzed: nissāraṇīya dhātu vimutta āyatana vimutti paripācanīya dhamma saññā ādi

original: Etena sabbenāti mahābodhimūlādidassanena. Apagamanaṃ nirupakkilesanti yojetabbaṃ.

original: Tenevāha “tannidānabhāvato tato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato”ti. Sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā

original: Paradhanaharaṇāditopi virati paresaṃ anatthapariharaṇavasappavattiyā siyā karuṇūpanissayāti

analyzed: yassā saṃvaṇṇana nti ādinā sambandham dassa iti payojanam

original: pana vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Abbhantaraṃ niyakajjhattaṃ, tato bahibhūtaṃ bāhiraṃ.

original: Dayāti karuṇā adhippetāti dayā-saddassa mettākaruṇānaṃ vācakattā vakkhamānañca anuyogaṃ

original: manasi katvā vuttaṃ. Tāya hi samussāhito, na mettāyāti adhippāyo. Pubbe vuttassa
analyzed: manasi katvā vuttam tāya hi samussāhitaḥ na mettāya ati adhippāyaḥ pubbe vuttassa

analyzed: paṭiniddesaḥ hoti iti attham āha tanti paññam visesetvā upamā bhāvena vinivattā

original: caritatthatāya. Paṭiniddesaṃ nārahati padhānāpadhānesu padhāne kiccadassanato. Dvinnaṃ

original: padānaṃ…pe… vatoti karuṇāvācinā dayā-saddena ekādhikaraṇabhāvena vuccamāno ta-saddo

original: tato aññadhammavisayo bhavituṃ na yuttoti adhippāyo. Apariyāyasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo

original: visesanavisesitabbabhāve sati hoti, nāññathāti āha “samānā…pe… hotī”ti. Samānādhikaraṇabhāvena

original: hettha visesanavisesitabbabhāvo sādhīyati, sā ca samānādhikaraṇatā visiṭṭhavibhattikānaṃ
analyzed: ha ittha visesana visesitabba bhāvaḥ sādhīyati sā ca samāna adhikaraṇa tā visiṭṭha vibhattikānam

analyzed: na tam eva sādhīyati iti idam

original: visesitabbabhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ. Padhānatāya hi sāmaññatāya ca sā visesitabbā jātā.

original: Tattha bhagavato tadaññesañca karuṇānaṃ vācakattā sāmaññatā veditabbā. Tassa cāti
analyzed: tattha bhagavataḥ tad aññesam ca karuṇānam vācaka ttā sāmañña tā veditabbā tassa ca ati

analyzed: pana kevalam avatvā dayā visesana bhāvena vutta ttā karuṇāya paṭiniddeso

original: yuttoti dasseti. Appadhānatā ca karuṇāya purimagāthāya vasena vuttā, idha pana padhānā

original: eva. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “dayāsamussāhinīti padhānā”ti.
analyzed: eva tathā ca vuttam dayā samussāhinī iti padhānā ti

analyzed: yathā metta citta tam āpannoti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā karuṇā evam nikkaruṇa tam

original: āpanno”ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā mettāti vacanamattaggahaṇe aṭṭhakathānampi
analyzed: āpannaḥ ti etissā aṭṭhakathāya vasena na dayā mettā ati vacana matta ggahaṇe aṭṭhakathānam pi

original: virodhaṃ dasseti. “Adhippāyavasena yojetabbo”ti vatvā tameva adhippāyaṃ dayā-saddo
analyzed: virodham dasseti adhippāya vasena yojetabbaḥ iti vatvā tam eva adhippāyam dayā saddaḥ

original: hītiādinā vivarati. Akkharacintakā hi dayā-saddaṃ dānagatirakkhaṇesu paṭhanti. Anurakkhaṇañca
analyzed: hi iti ādinā akkhara cintakāḥ hi dayā saddam dāna gati rakkhaṇesu paṭhanti anurakkhaṇam ca

analyzed: dayā saddaḥ pavattati iti vuttam antonītam ti antogadham rukkha atthaḥ viya dhava khadira ādīnam

original: anurakkhaṇattho mettākaruṇānaṃ sāmaññanti attho, adhippāyo pana “dayāpanno”ti ettha
analyzed: anurakkhaṇa atthaḥ mettā karuṇānam sāmaññanti atthaḥ adhippāyaḥ pana dayā āpannaḥ ti ettha

original: sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti anantaraṃ karuṇāya vuttattā dayā-saddo mettāpariyāyoti

original: Nanu tāyātiādinā sāmatthiyatopi pakaraṇaṃ balavanti pakaraṇavaseneva karuṇāvisayassa

original: 6. Tathāgato vandanīyotiādinā “namassitvā”tiādikiriyāvisesānaṃ taṃtaṃsuttānurodhena
analyzed: tathāgataḥ vandanīyaḥ iti ādinā namassitvā ati ādi kiriyā visesānam tad tad sutta anurodhena

original: Vīsatigāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: nidāna kathā vaṇṇanā

original: ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttesu

original: “vuttañheta”ntiādivacanasambandhesu abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu
analyzed: vuttam hetat ti ādi vacana sambandhesu abbhuta dhamma paṭisaṃyuttesu ca sutta visesesu

original: visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyaṅgādayo. Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ,
analyzed: visesa vidhayaḥ pare geyyaṅga ādayaḥ yam pana ittha geyyaṅga ādi nimitta rahitam

original: taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanatoti.

analyzed: pucchā vissajjana bhāvaḥ veyyākaraṇa bhāvassa nimittan ti yat ca vuttam gāthā bhāvato

original: maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na, niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīsu
analyzed: maṅgala sutta ādīnam suttaṅga saṅgahaḥ na siyāti tam na niruḷha ttā niruḷhaḥ hi maṅgala sutta ādīsu

analyzed: sutta bhāvena iva tena iva hi aṭṭhakathā ayam suttanāmakanti nāma ggahaṇam katam yam pana

analyzed: saha gāthāhi iti sagāthakam sahabhāvaḥ ca nāma attataḥ aññena hoti na ca maṅgala sutta ādīsu

analyzed: gāthā vinimuttaḥ koci sutta ppadesaḥ atthi yaḥ saha gāthāhi iti vucceyya na ca samudāyaḥ

analyzed: nāma koci atthi yat api vuttam ubhatas vibhaṅga ādīsu sagāthaka ppadesānam geyyaṅga saṅgaho

analyzed: ubhatas vibhaṅga ādīnam geyyaṅga bhāvaḥ ti evam sutta ādīnam aṅgānam aññamañña saṅkara abhāvaḥ veditabbo

analyzed: vā saḥ evam pajānāmi sammādiṭṭhi paccayā api vedayitan ti vuttam pāḷiyam pana so

original: evaṃ pajānāmi micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayitaṃ. Sammādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”nti

analyzed: āgatam paccaya ādīhi iti paccaya sabhāva vūpasama tad upāya ādīhi paravādi codanam

analyzed: desetabbo ca ati adhigantabba desetabbo saḥ eva dhammo tad anurūpena ettha ca yathā dhamma sāsana ttā

original: yathādhigatadhammadesanābhāvato abhidhammassa abhisambodhi adhigamanidānaṃ. Desakālādiyeva

original: desanānidānaṃ. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “desanānidānaṃ yāva dhammacakkappavattanā”ti
analyzed: desanā nidānam yam pana aṭṭhakathāyam desanā nidānam yāva dhamma cakka ppavattanā ti

original: jātakasatesu paripācanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi ettakāsu eva jātīsu puññādisambhārasambharaṇaṃ,
analyzed: jātaka satesu paripācanam vuttanti daṭṭhabbam na hi ettakāsu eva jātīsu puñña ādi sambhāra sambharaṇam

original: kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ ettakā eva jātiyo desitāti? Tadaññesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyā abhāvato.

original: Sumedhakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sumedha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Uppanne buddhe tato attānaṃ seyyato vā sadisato vā dahanto jhānābhiññāhi parihāyati,
analyzed: uppanne buddhe tatas attānam seyyataḥ vā sadisataḥ vā dahantaḥ jhāna abhiññāhi parihāyati

original: na tathā sumedhapaṇḍito aṭṭhāsīti tassa jhānābhiññāhi aparihāni daṭṭhabbā. Tenevāha
analyzed: na tathā sumedha paṇḍitaḥ aṭṭhāsi iti tassa jhāna abhiññāhi daṭṭhabbā tena iva āha

analyzed: tena iva āha aviparītam eva ti upapāramī ādi vibhāgena aneka ppakāra tā samādāna adhiṭṭhānan ti

analyzed: anurūpa pubba nimitta bhūtam tathā hi tam manussa purisa bhāva ādi ādhāram eva jātam kāya ādīsu

analyzed: tena āha esā me vīriya pāramī iti

analyzed: nidāna kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 1. Cittuppādakaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: cittuppāda kaṇḍam

original: Tikamātikāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tikamātikā pada vaṇṇanā

original: ādi-saddena nahetupadaahetukapadahetusampayuttapadāni hetuvippayuttapadampi vā saṅgaṇhāti.

original: Ubhayekapadavasenāti ubhayapadavasena hetudukasambandho, ekapadavasena sahetukadukasambandho.

analyzed: tathā iti ubhaya eka pada vasena ettha ca yathā

analyzed: dutiya duka tatiya duka sambandho osāna dukaḥ kilesa gocchake ca dutiya catuttha duka sambandho ti

original: Dhammānaṃ sāvasesaniravasesabhāvena tikadukānaṃ sappadesanippadesatā vuttāti yehi
analyzed: dhammānam sa avasesa niravasesa bhāvena tika dukānam sappadesa nippadesa tā vuttā ati yehi

original: tikadukā sāvasesāti padissanti apadissanti, te asaṅgahitadhammāpadeso. Evaṃ sati

original: “asaṅgahito”ti visesanaṃ kimatthiyanti? Etassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: yathādhippetaṃ visesaṃ dassento “asaṅgahito”ti āha.
analyzed: yathā adhippetam visesam dassentaḥ asaṅgahito ti āha

original: Anavajjattho avajjavirahattho. Nāmaṃ saññā, kiriyā karaṇaṃ, payojanaṃ ratharathaṅgavibhāvanena

original: Na hi antarena yonisomanasikāraṃ kusaluppatti atthīti. “Yadi kusalassa ubhayabhāgagataṃ

original: saṃkilesalavanaṃ pākaṭaṃ siyā, kusā viya lunantīti kusalāti ayamattho yutto siyā”ti
analyzed: saṃkilesa lavanam pākaṭam siyā kusāḥ viya lunanti iti kusalā ati ayam atthaḥ yuttaḥ siyāti

original: koci vadeyyāti āsaṅkāya āha “sammappadhānadvayaṃ viyā”ti.

original: Na cātiādinā “sabhāvaṃ dhārentī”ti ettha paramatthato kattukammassa ca bhedo natthi,
analyzed: na ca ati ādinā sabhāvam dhārenti iti ettha paramatthataḥ kattu kammassa ca bhedaḥ natthi

original: kappanāsiddho eva pana bhedoti dasseti. Tattha nāmavasena viññātāviññāteti yesaṃ
analyzed: kappanā siddhaḥ eva pana bhedaḥ ti dasseti tattha nāma vasena viññāta aviññātā iti yesam

analyzed: dhammā ati iminā pariyāyena aviññātā sabhāvā sabhāvam dhārenti iti iminā ca pariyāyena

original: viññātā, tesaṃ vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamo attho saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammavasena
analyzed: viññātā tesam vasena evam vuttam ettha ca paṭhamaḥ attho saṅkhata asaṅkhata dhamma vasena

original: vutto, dutiyo saṅkhatavasena, tatiyo saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: Kusalapaṭisedhanaṃ kusalābhāvo eva. Abhāvo hi sattāpaṭisedhoti. Dhammoti sabhāvadhammo.
analyzed: kusala paṭisedhanam kusala abhāvaḥ eva abhāvaḥ hi sattā paṭisedho ti dhammo ti sabhāva dhammo

original: Akusalavacanena na koci attho sabhāvadhammassa abodhakattāti adhippāyo. Atha siyā
analyzed: akusala vacanena na koci atthaḥ sabhāva dhammassa a bodhaka ttā ati adhippāyaḥ atha siyā

original: akusalavacanena koci attho asabhāvadhammabodhakattepi “paññattidhammā”tiādīsu viya,
analyzed: akusala vacanena koci atthaḥ asabhāva dhamma bodhaka tte pi paññatti dhamma ati ādīsu viya

original: evaṃ sati “anabyākatā”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā, tato cāyaṃ catukko āpajjati, na tiko.
analyzed: evam sati anabyākatā iti ca vattabbam siyā tatas ca ayam catukkaḥ āpajjati na tikaḥ

original: Tasmāti yasmā dukacatukkabhāvo anabyākatavohāro ca natthi, so ca vuttanayena abhāvamattavacane

analyzed: āpajjati tasmā sabhāva dhāraṇa ādi iti ādi saddena dhārīyanti paccayehi iti ayam atthaḥ

original: saṅgahito. Ñeyyapariyāyena pana dhamma-saddenāyaṃ dosoti nanu añeyyapariyāyepi dhamma-sadde
analyzed: saṅgahitaḥ ñeyya pariyāyena pana dhamma saddena ayam doso ti nanu añeyya pariyāye api dhamma sadde

original: Chahi padehi tikesu, catūhi dukesu yathākkamaṃ cha cattāro atthā vuttā. Chakkabhāvo

analyzed: dadāti iti evam kiriyā guṇa ādi pariggaha visesena

analyzed: samāna iti ekasmin abhidhāna atthaḥ api hi anavajja sukha vipāka ādi abhidheyyatthaḥ

analyzed: ettha āha kim pana kāraṇam tikā eva paṭhamam vuttā na dukā tikesu pi kusala ttikā uva

analyzed: kusala ttike pi ca padhāna pāsaṃsa ubhaya hita bhāvato kusalā dhammā paṭhamam vuttā kusalā

original: vedanāya sampayuttā vipākadhammadhammā anupādinnupādāniyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā…pe…

original: araṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti kusalalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā akusalaggahaṇena
analyzed: araṇāḥ dhammā te bodhitāḥ bhavanti kusala lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā tathā akusala ggahaṇena

original: ye sāvajjadukkhavipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: ye sāvajja dukkha vipākā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttā vipākadhammadhammā anupādinnupādāniyā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā…pe…
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttāḥ vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ anupādinnupādāniyāḥ saṃkiliṭṭha saṃkilesikā pe

original: saraṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti akusalalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā abyākataggahaṇena
analyzed: saraṇāḥ dhammā te bodhitāḥ bhavanti akusala lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā tathā abyākata ggahaṇena

original: ye avipākārahā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: ye a vipāka arahā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttāḥ adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttā vipākā dhammā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā upādinnupādāniyā
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttāḥ vipākāḥ dhammāḥ neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammāḥ upādinna upādāniyāḥ

original: anupādinnupādāniyā anupādinnaanupādāniyā…pe… araṇā dhammā, te bodhitā bhavanti abyākatalakkhaṇena
analyzed: anupādinnupādāniyāḥ anupādinna anupādāniyā ape araṇāḥ dhammā te bodhitāḥ bhavanti abyākata lakkhaṇena

original: ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: eka lakkhaṇa ttā ti ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: “Kucchite pāpadhamme salayantī”tiādinā nirutti veditabbā, kusalādimukhena rūpārūpadhamme
analyzed: kucchite pāpa dhamme nirutti veditabbā kusala ādi mukhena rūpa arūpa dhamme

original: pariggahetvā visuddhiparamparāya “kathaṃ nu kho sattā anupādisesanibbānabhāgino bhaveyyu”nti
analyzed: pariggahetvā visuddhi paramparāya katham nu kho sattāḥ anupādisesa nibbāna bhāginaḥ bhaveyyunti

original: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo, nidānaṃ asādhāraṇato kusalādibhedena bujjhanakasattā.
analyzed: ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ nidānam asādhāraṇataḥ kusala ādi bhedena bujjhanaka sattā

original: Sādhāraṇato pana pākaṭameva. Paṭhamaṃ kusalattikassa desanā vicāritāyevāti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: sādhāraṇataḥ pana pākaṭam eva paṭhamam kusala ttikassa desanā vicāritāya iva ati ayam catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Kusalaggahaṇena kalyāṇamittapariggaho yonisomanasikārapariggaho ca. Tattha paṭhamena
analyzed: kusala ggahaṇena kalyāṇa mitta pariggaho yoniso manasikāra pariggaho ca tattha paṭhamena

original: sakalaṃ brahmacariyamāvattati, dutiyena ca yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā. Akusalaggahaṇena
analyzed: sakalam brahmacariyam āvattati dutiyena ca yoni soma nasikāra mūlakāḥ dhammāḥ akusala ggahaṇena

original: vuttavipariyāyena yojetabbaṃ. Abyākataggahaṇena pana sakalasaṃkilesavodānapakkho
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena yojetabbam abyākata ggahaṇena pana sakala saṃkilesa vodāna pakkhaḥ

original: yathārahamāvattatīti ayaṃ āvatto hāro.
analyzed: yathāraham āvattati iti ayam āvattaḥ hāraḥ

original: Tattha kusalā bhūmito catudhā vibhattā, sampayuttapavattiākārādito pana anekadhā.
analyzed: tattha kusalā bhūmitaḥ catudhā vibhattā sampayutta pavatti ākāra āditaḥ pana anekadhā

original: Akusalā bhūmito ekadhā vibhattā, sampayuttādito anekadhā. Abyākatā pana vipākakiriyarūpanibbānavasena
analyzed: akusalā bhūmitaḥ ekadhā vibhattā sampayutta āditaḥ anekadhā abyākatā pana vipāka kiriya rūpa nibbāna vasena

original: catudhā bhūmisampayuttādito anekadhā ca vibhattāti ayaṃ vibhatti hāro.
analyzed: catudhā bhūmi sampayutta āditas anekadhā ca ayam hāro

original: Kusalā dhammā akusalānaṃ tadaṅgādippahānāya vītikkamādippahānāya ca saṃvattanti,
analyzed: kusalāḥ dhammāḥ akusalānam tad aṅga ādi pahānāya vītikkama ādi ppahānāya ca saṃvattanti

original: akusalā dhammā kusalānaṃ anupasampajjanāya, abyākatesu asaṅkhatadhātu sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇāyāti
analyzed: akusalāḥ dhammāḥ kusalānam an upasampajjanāya abyākatesu asaṅkhata dhātu sabba saṅkhata nissaraṇāya ati

original: ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
analyzed: ayam parivattaḥ hāraḥ

original: Kusalā anavajjā puññānīti pariyāyavacanaṃ, akusalā sāvajjā apuññānīti pariyāya vacanaṃ, abyākatā avipākārahā nevaācayagāmī naapacayagāmīnoti pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
analyzed: kusalā anavajjā puññāni iti pariyāya vacanam akusalā sāvajjā apuññāni iti pariyāya vacanam abyākatā a vipāka ārahā neva ācaya gāmī na apacaya gāmīnaḥ ti pariyāya vacanan ti ayam vevacanaḥ hāraḥ

original: Kusalādayo “yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā pabhavabhūmivevacanapaññattivasena yathāsambhavaṃ pariññādipaññattivasena ca paññattāti ayaṃ paññatti hāro.
analyzed: kusala ādayaḥ yasmin samaya iti ādinā pabhava bhūmi vevacana paññatti vasena yathāsambhavam pariññā ādi paññatti vasena ca paññattā ati ayam paññatti hāro

original: Akusalānaṃ kucchitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ salanaṃ kusānaṃ viya kusānaṃ vā rāgādīnaṃ lavanaṃ
analyzed: akusalānam kucchitānam pāpa dhammānam salanam kusānam viya kusānam vā rāga ādīnam lavanam

original: evaṃdhammatāti ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena avataraṇaṃ, tathā kusena lātabbā kosallasambhūtā
analyzed: evaṃdhammatā ti ayam paṭiccasamuppāda mukhena avataraṇam tathā kusena lātabbā kosalla sambhūtā

original: cāti paccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāya paṭiccasamuppāda…pe… avataraṇaṃ, paccayapaṭibaddhavuttitāya
analyzed: ca ati paccaya paṭibaddha vutti tāya paṭicca samuppāda pe avataraṇam paccaya paṭibaddha vutti tāya

original: vā ādiantavantā aniccantikā cāti aniccatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ, aniccatā eva udayabbayapaṭipīḷitatāya
analyzed: vā ādi antavantā aniccantikā ca ati anicca tā mukhena avataraṇam anicca tā eva udaya bbaya paṭipīḍita tāya

original: dukkhāti dukkhatāmukhena avataraṇaṃ, nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhammāti abyāpārato suññatāmukhena
analyzed: dukkhā ati dukkha tā mukhena avataraṇam nissatta nijjīva ṭṭhena dhammā ati abyāpārato suñña tā mukhena

original: avataraṇaṃ, evaṃ kusalāti cattāro khandhā dvāyatanāni dve dhātuyotiādinā khandhāyatanadhātādimukhenapi
analyzed: avataraṇam evam cattāraḥ khandhāḥ dvā āyatanāni dve dhātu yoti ādinā khandha āyatana dhāta ādi mukhena pi

original: avataraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iminā nayena akusalābyākatesupi avataraṇaṃ dassetabbanti ayaṃ avataraṇo hāro.
analyzed: avataraṇam veditabbam iminā nayena akusala abyākatesu pi avataraṇam dassetabban ti ayam avataraṇaḥ hāro

original: Kusalāti ārambho, dhammāti padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. Tathā akusalā dhammā abyākatāti, dhammāti pana padasuddhi ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
analyzed: kusalā ati ārambhaḥ dhammā ati pada suddhi no ārambha suddhi tathā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ abyākatā ati dhammā ati pana pada suddhi ārambha suddhi ca ati ayam sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Dhammāti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā visesavacanaṃ kusalākusalābyākatāti.
analyzed: dhammā ti sāmaññataḥ adhiṭṭhānam tam a vikappetvā visesa vacanam kusala akusala abyākatā ti

original: Tathā kusalā dhammāti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ avikappetvā kāmāvacaraṃ somanassasahagatantiādi
analyzed: tathā kusalāḥ dhammā ti sāmaññataḥ adhiṭṭhānam tam a vikappetvā kāmāvacaram somanassa sahagata ntiādi

original: visesavacanaṃ. Akusalā dhammātiādīsupi eseva nayoti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
analyzed: visesa vacanam akusalāḥ dhammā ti ādīsu pi esa iva nayo ti ayam adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ navamo khaṇo cattāri ca sampatticakkāni yonisomanasikāro eva
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam navamaḥ khaṇaḥ cattāri ca sampatti cakkāni yoniso manasikāraḥ eva

original: vā hetu, vuttavipariyāyena akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetu, kusalākusalā dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ
analyzed: vā hetu vutta vipariyāyena akusalānam dhammānam hetu kusala akusalāḥ dhammāḥ yathāsambhavam

original: abyākatānaṃ dhammānaṃ hetūti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
analyzed: abyākatānam dhammānam hetu uti ayam parikkhāraḥ hāro

original: Kusalāti pariññeyyaggahaṇañceva bhāvetabbaggahaṇañca. Akusalāti pariññeyyaggahaṇañceva
analyzed: kusalā ati pariññeyya ggahaṇañca iva bhāvetabba ggahaṇañca akusalā ati pariññeyya ggahaṇañca iva

original: pahātabbaggahaṇañca. Abyākatāti pariññeyyaggahaṇañceva sacchikātabbaggahaṇañca. Dhammāti
analyzed: pahātabba ggahaṇañca abyākatā ati pariññeyya ggahaṇañca iva sacchikātabba ggahaṇañca dhammā ati

original: pariññādīnaṃ pavattanākāraggahaṇaṃ. Tena pariññeyyappahānabhāvanāsacchikaraṇāni dīpitānīti
analyzed: pariññā ādīnam pavattana ākāra ggahaṇam tena pariññeyya ppahāna bhāvanā sacchikaraṇāni dīpitāni iti

original: tadaṅgādivītikkamādippahānāni lokiyalokuttarā ca bhāvanā dassitāti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
analyzed: tad aṅga ādi vītikkama ādi ppahānāni lokiya lokuttarā ca bhāvanā dassitā ati ayam samāropanaḥ hāro

original: Kāmañcetaṃ avisesato sabhāvadhammakathanaṃ, visesavanto pana dhammā visesato niddhāritā.
analyzed: kāmañca itam avisesataḥ sabhāva dhamma kathanam visesavantaḥ pana dhammāḥ visesataḥ niddhāritā

original: Tathā hi citteneva samayo niyamito, tasmā kusalaggahaṇena visesato sādhiṭṭhāno samatho
analyzed: tathā hi cittena iva samayaḥ niyamito tasmā kusala ggahaṇena visesato sa adhiṭṭhānaḥ samatho

original: vipassanā ca dassitāti. Tathā tappaṭipakkhato akusalaggahaṇena sādhiṭṭhānā taṇhā
analyzed: vipassanā ca dassitā ti tathā tad paṭipakkhataḥ akusala ggahaṇena sa adhiṭṭhānā taṇhā

original: avijjā ca, abyākataggahaṇena saparivārā cetovimutti paññāvimutti cāti ayaṃ nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi.
analyzed: avijjā ca abyākata ggahaṇena sa parivārā cetaḥ vimutti paññā vimutti ca ati ayam nandiyāvattassa nayassa bhūmi

original: Tathā kusalaggahaṇena mūlabhāvavisesato tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tesu ca adosena sīlakkhandho,
analyzed: tathā kusala ggahaṇena mūla bhāva visesataḥ tīṇi kusala mūlāni tesu ca adosena sīla kkhandho

original: alobhena samādhikkhandho, amohena paññākkhandho nīyati. Tathā akusalaggahaṇena tīṇi
analyzed: alobhena samādhi kkhandhaḥ amohena paññā kkhandhaḥ nīyati tathā akusala ggahaṇena tīṇi

original: akusalamūlāni, tesu ca lobhena tadekaṭṭhā akusalā dhammā. Tathā dosamohehi taṃtadekaṭṭhā.
analyzed: akusala mūlāni tesu ca lobhena tad ekaṭṭhāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ tathā dosa mohehi tad tad ekaṭṭhā

original: Abyākataggahaṇena appaṇihitānimittasuññatā nīyantīti ayaṃ tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi.
analyzed: abyākata ggahaṇena appaṇihita animitta suñña tāḥ nīyanti iti ayam tipukkhalassa nayassa bhūmi

original: Tathā kusalaggahaṇena yato kosallato sambhūtā kusalā, taṃ paññindriyaṃ. Taṃsahajātā
analyzed: tathā kusala ggahaṇena yatas kosallataḥ sambhūtā kusalā tam paññindriyam tad sahajātā

original: tadupanissayā ca saddahanussahanāpilāpāvikkhepā saddhindriyādīni. Tehi ca sabbe saddhammā
analyzed: tad upanissayā ca saddaha nussahana apilāpa avikkhepā saddhi indriya ādīni tehi ca sabbe saddhammā

original: bodhitā bhavanti. Akusalaggahaṇena akosallapaṭicchāditādīnavesu kāyavedanācittadhammesu
analyzed: bodhitāḥ bhavanti akusala ggahaṇena akosalla paṭicchādita ādīnavesu kāya vedanā citta dhammesu

original: subhasukhaniccaattābhinivesabhūtā cattāro vipallāsā. Abyākataggahaṇena yathāvuttaindriyapaccayāni
analyzed: subha sukha nicca attā abhinivesa bhūtā cattāraḥ vipallāsāḥ abyākata ggahaṇena yathāvutta indriya paccayāni

original: yathāvuttavipallāsappahānabhūtāni ca cattāri sāmaññaphalāni bodhitānīti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa
analyzed: yathā vutta vipallāsa pahāna bhūtāni ca cattāri sāmañña phalāni bodhitāni iti ayam sīhavikkīḷitassa

original: nayassa bhūmīti ime tayo atthanayā.
analyzed: nayassa bhūmi iti ime tayaḥ atthanayā

original: Tehi ca siddhehi dve kammanayāpi siddhā hontīti. Ayaṃ tiko sabbadhammasaṅgahitasabbabhāgiyo veditabboti idaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tehi ca siddhehi dve kammanayā api siddhāḥ honti iti ayam tikaḥ sabba dhamma saṅgahita sabba bhāgiyaḥ veditabbaḥ iti idam sāsana paṭṭhānam

original: Ayaṃ tāva nettinayena kusalattikavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ayam tāva na itti nayena kusala ttika vaṇṇanā

original: Evaṃ vedanāttikādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ catusaccaniddhāraṇādividhinā soḷasa hārā pañca
analyzed: evam yathāsambhavam pañca

original: nayā niddisitabbā, ativitthārabhayena pana na vitthārayāma. Sakkā hi iminā nayena
analyzed: nayāḥ niddisitabbāḥ ati vitthāra bhayena pana na vitthārayāma sakkā hi iminā nayena

original: tesu tesu tikadukesu taṃtaṃhāranayayojanānurūpadhammaniddhāraṇavasena te te hāranayā
analyzed: tesu tesu tika dukesu taṃ taṃ hāra naya yojana anurūpa dhamma niddhāraṇa vasena te te hāra nayāḥ

original: viññunā niddisitunti.
analyzed: viññunā niddisitunti

original: 2. Tañca sukhindriyaṃ sukhavedanā eva hoti sāmaññassa bhedapariyādānato, bhedassa
analyzed: tat ca sukha indriyam sukha vedanā eva hoti sāmaññassa bheda pariyādānataḥ bhedassa

original: ca sāmaññapariccāgatoti adhippāyo. Yasmā pana visesasāmaññāni avayavasamudāyā viya
analyzed: ca sāmañña pariccāgato ti adhippāyaḥ yasmā pana visesa sāmaññāni avayava samudāyāḥ viya

original: aññamaññato bhinnāni, tasmā “na pana…pe… samānatthattā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva nesaṃ
analyzed: aññam aññatas bhinnāni tasmā na pana pe samāna attha ttā ti vuttam idāni tam eva

original: bhinnatatvaṃ “ayañhī”tiādinā vivarati. Tanti sukhahetūnaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Tena sukhassa
analyzed: ayam hi iti ādinā sukha hetūnam kāraṇam tena sukhassa

original: kāraṇaṃ sukhahetu, sukhassa kāraṇakāraṇaṃ sukhamūlanti dasseti. Sukhahetūnanti ettha
analyzed: kāraṇam sukha hetu sukhassa kāraṇa kāraṇam sukha mūlanti dasseti ettha

original: hetu-saddena kāraṇabhāvasāmaññato hetupaccayā saṅgahitāti āha “puññapassaddhiādīna”nti.
analyzed: hetu saddena kāraṇa bhāva sāmaññataḥ hetu paccayā saṅgahitā ti āha puñña passaddhi ādīnam ti

original: Ettha ca sukhamūlasukhahetūsu phalūpacārena, sukhārammaṇasukhapaccayaṭṭhānesu sukhasahacariyāya,
analyzed: ettha ca sukha mūla sukha hetūsu phala upacārena sukha ārammaṇa sukha paccaya ṭṭhānesu sukha sahacariyāya

original: abyāpajjanibbānesu dukkhāpagamabhāvena sukhapariyāyo vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Iṭṭhāsūti
analyzed: a byāpajja nibbānesu dukkha apagama bhāvena sukha pariyāyaḥ vuttaḥ ti daṭṭhabbaḥ iṭṭhāsu ti

original: sukhupekkhānaṃ vipariṇāmāññāṇasaṅkhāradukkhatāya aniṭṭhabhāvopi atthīti viseseti.
analyzed: sukha upekkhānam vipariṇāma aññāṇa saṅkhāra dukkha tāya aniṭṭha bhāvaḥ api atthi iti viseseti

original: Upekkhameva vā apekkhitvā visesanaṃ kataṃ. Sā hi akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhāpi atthīti.
analyzed: upekkham eva vā apekkhitvā visesanam katam sā hi akusala vipāka bhūtā aniṭṭhā api atthi iti

original: Evamādīsūti ādi-saddena “sovaggikaṃ sukhavipāka”nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Iṭṭhapariyāyo
analyzed: evamādīsu iti ādi saddena sovaggikam sukha vipākam ti evamādim saṅgaṇhāti iṭṭha pariyāyaḥ

original: hi ettha sukha-saddoti.
analyzed: hi ettha sukha saddo ti

original: Saṅkhāradukkhādīsūti ettha ādi-saddena “ṭhitisukhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ, akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhāra dukkha ādīsu iti ettha ādi saddena ṭhiti sukham vipariṇāma dukkham akusalam kāya kammam

original: dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipāka”ntiādike saṅgaṇhāti. Yathākkamaṃ sukhavedanā dukkhaaniṭṭhapariyāyo
analyzed: dukkhudrayam dukkha vipākam ti ādike saṅgaṇhāti yathākkamam sukha vedanā dukkha aniṭṭha pariyāyo

original: hi ettha dukkha-saddoti. Dukkhavedanādukkhavatthuādīsu dukkhasaddappavatti vuttanayeneva
analyzed: hi ettha dukkha saddo ti dukkha vedanā dukkha vatthu ādīsu dukkha sadda ppavatti vutta nayena iva

original: yojetabbā. Vipākāvipākabhedāya sabbāyapi sukhavedanāya vasena lakkhaṇassa vuttattā
analyzed: yojetabbā vipāka avipāka bhedāya sabbāya api sukha vedanāya vasena lakkhaṇassa vutta ttā

original: tadubhayānukūlamatthaṃ vivaranto “sabhāvato”tiādimāha. Tattha vipākā sabhāvato iṭṭhassa

original: vipariyesito, soyamattho alātacakkena supākaṭo hoti. Tenevāha “ekībhūtānamivā”ti.

original: Ekasamūhavasena ekībhūtānamiva pavatti samūhaghanatā, dubbiññeyyakiccabhedavasena

original: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo, samūho yathā “samudāyo”ti.

original: Tānevāti pīḷanādīneva. Vipphārikatā seribhāvena kiriyāsu ussāhanaparinipphanno.

original: Kesucīti akusalavipākādīsu. Khaṇassa asambhavo tena vinābhāvoti āha “nanū”tiādi.
analyzed: kesuci iti akusala vipāka ādīsu khaṇassa asambhavaḥ tena vinābhāvaḥ ti āha nanu utiādi

original: Dhammenevāti visesantararahitena. Taṃyeva hi avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ visesaṃ dasseti
analyzed: dhammena iva ati visesa antara rahitena hi avadhāraṇena nivattitam visesam dasseti

original: Idha uttamahetuno sambhavo eva natthīti hetuhetusādhāraṇahetūyeva paṭisedheti. Tappaccayataṃ anekapaccayataṃ.

original: sahassepi samāgate nattheva samatthatāti āha “nipphādanasamatthassā”ti. Ettha ca
analyzed: sahasse pi samāgate nattha iva samattha tā ti āha nipphādana samatthassa ati ettha ca

analyzed: viya ati apekkhā daṭṭhabbā

original: Etenupāyenāti yoyaṃ khaṇasaṅkhāto samayo kusaluppattiyā dullabhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Attano
analyzed: etena upāyena ati yaḥ ayam khaṇa saṅkhātaḥ samayaḥ kusala uppattiyā dullabha bhāvam dīpeti attanaḥ

analyzed: na na ppavattati iti imassa visesassa jotana attham pāḷiyam ārammaṇam eva gahitam dvāram

analyzed: na gahitanti imam attham dasseti ārammaṇam eva nibaddha nti ādinā vacī dvāre uppajjamānam pi

original: pāṇātipātādīti attho.
analyzed: pāṇa atipāta ādi iti attho

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam

original: Kāyakammadvārakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: kāya kamma dvāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Kammadvārānantiādinā pakāsetabbassa sarūpaṃ pakāsanupāyañca dasseti. Niyatarūparūpavasenāti

original: sannivesassa vibhāvitattā.
analyzed: sannivesassa vibhāvita ttā

original: āha. Desantaruppattihetubhāvena cāletunti etena desantaruppatti calanaṃ, taṃnimitte
analyzed: āha desantara uppatti hetu bhāvena etena desantara uppatti calanam tad nimitte

original: ca kattubhāvo upacaritoti dasseti, aññathā khaṇikatā abyāpāratā ca dhammānaṃ na sambhaveyyāti.

original: Tadabhimukhabhāvavikāravatīti taṃdisamabhimukho tadabhimukho, tassa bhāvo tadabhimukhabhāvo,

analyzed: imissā attha vaṇṇanāya laddha guṇam dasseti tattha āvajjanassa ati manaḥ dvāra āvajjanassa

original: Yato bāttiṃsātiādinā tassa viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatā na sakkā paṭisedhetunti dasseti.

analyzed: avatthā visesa mattam so ākāra viseso ti paramatthataḥ na kiñci hoti iti paramatthataḥ abhāvam

analyzed: āha cakkhu viññāṇassa atiādi

original: dasseti. Sañjānāti etenāti saññāṇaṃ, tassa udakādino saññāṇaṃ taṃsaññāṇaṃ, tassa
analyzed: dassa iti sañjānāti etena ati saññāṇam tassa udaka ādino saññāṇam tad saññāṇam tassa

original: Atha panātiādinā viññattiyā anumānena gahetabbataṃ dasseti. Sādhippāya…pe… nantaranti

analyzed: viññātaḥ yā iva hoti na ānantariyaka ttā evam vipphandamāna vaṇṇa ggahaṇa anantarena purima siddha sambandha an uggahitena

original: Sabhāvabhūtanti anvatthabhūtaṃ. Dvidhāti viññāpanato viññeyyato ca. Kāyaviññattiyā

original: Tena vacīdvāruppannāpi pāṇātipātādayo saṅgahitāti tesaṃ saṅgahitabhāvaṃ dasseti.

original: Dvārantaracārinoti dvārantarabhāvena pavattanakā. Dvārasambhedāti dvārānaṃ saṅkaraṇato.
analyzed: dvāra antara cārinaḥ ti dvāra antara bhāvena pavattanakāḥ dvāra sambhedāḥ ti saṅkaraṇataḥ

original: Dvārānañhi dvārantarabhāvappattiyā sati kāyadvārassa vacīdvārādibhāvo, vacīdvārassa
analyzed: dvāra an añchi dvāra antara bhāva ppattiyā sati kāya dvārassa vacī dvāra ādi bhāvaḥ vacī dvārassa

original: Evaṃ sati kāyakammaṃ…pe… vavatthānaṃ na siyā. Yadi kammāni kammantaracārīni honti,
analyzed: evam sati kāya kammaṃpe vavatthānam na siyā yadi kammāni kamma antara cārīni honti

original: kāyakammādikassa vacīkammādikabhāvāpattito “kammasambhedā dvārasambhedopī”ti kāyakammaṃ

original: kāyakammadvāranti aññamaññavavatthānaṃ na siyāti imamatthamāha “kammānampi kammantaracaraṇe
analyzed: kāya kamma dvāram ti aññamañña vavatthānam na siyā ti imam attham āha kammānam pi kamma antara caraṇe

original: eseva nayo”ti. Kammantaracaraṇaṃ kammantarūpalakkhaṇatā. Tenevāha “dvārabhāvenā”ti.
analyzed: esā iva nayo ti kamma antara caraṇam kammanta rūpa lakkhaṇa tā tena iva āha dvāra bhāvena ati

original: Dvārantaracaraṇaṃ dvārantaruppatti. Dvāreti attano dvāre. Aññasminti dvārantare.
analyzed: dvāra antara caraṇam dvāra antar uppatti dvāra iti attanaḥ dvāre aññasmin ti dvāra antare

original: Kammānīti taṃtaṃdvārikakammāni. Aññānīti aññadvārikakammāni. Dvāre dvārāni na carantīti

original: dvārantarabhāvena nappavattanti, dvārantaraṃ vā na saṅkamanti. Kiñcāpi viññattiyā
analyzed: dvāra antara bhāvena na ppavattanti dvāra antaram vā na saṅkamanti kiñca api viññattiyā

original: catuvīsatiyā paccayesu yena kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccayabhāvo natthi, tathā
analyzed: catuvīsatiyā paccayesu yena kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccaya bhāvaḥ natthi tathā

original: pana viññattiyā pavattamānāya eva pāṇātipātādi hoti, nāññathāti siyā viññattiyā hetubhāvo
analyzed: pana viññattiyā pavattamānāya eva pāṇātipāta ādi hoti na aññathā ati siyā viññattiyāḥ hetu bhāvaḥ

original: cetanāyāti vuttaṃ “dvārehi kāraṇabhūtehī”ti. Kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti kammavavatthānasseva

original: vuttaṃ, “aññamaññaṃ vavatthitā”ti pana vuttattā kammehipi dvārāni vavatthitānīti
analyzed: vuttam aññam aññam vavatthitā ati pana vutta ttā dvārāni vavatthitāni iti

original: ayamatthopi siddhoyevāti dassetuṃ “na kevala”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Advāracārīhīti dvārānaṃ
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ api siddhaḥ yeva ati dassetum na kevala ntiādi vuttam a dvāra cārīhi iti

original: sayaṃ vavatthitabhāvamāha, na pana avavatthānaṃ, vavatthānamevāti adhippāyo. Idāni
analyzed: sayam vavatthita bhāvam āha na pana a vavatthānam vavatthānam eva ati adhippāyaḥ idāni

original: taṃ vavatthānaṃ vibhāveti kammānapekkhātiādinā. Tattha samayaniyamitena cittena samayo
analyzed: tam vavatthānam vibhāveti kamma anapekkhā ti ādinā tattha samaya niyamitena cittena samayaḥ

original: viya dvāraniyamitehi kammehi dvārāni niyamitānīti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
analyzed: viya dvāra niyamitehi kammehi dvārāni niyamitāni iti ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ

original: Evaṃsabhāvattāti dvārabhūtehi kāyādīhi upalakkhaṇīyasabhāvattā. Āṇatti…pe… mānassāti
analyzed: evaṃsabhāvattā ti dvāra bhūtehi kāya ādīhi upalakkhaṇīya sabhāvattā āṇatti pe mānassa ati

original: kāyavacīkammānaṃ vacīkāyaviññattīhi pakāsetabbataṃ āha. Kāyādīhīti kāyavacīviññattīhi.

original: Cittakiriyābhāvenāti cittabyāpārabhāvena. Phassassa sampajjanamuppajjanameva. Sannipatitappavattiyā
analyzed: citta kiriyā bhāvena ati citta byāpāra bhāvena phassassa sampajjanam uppajjanam eva sannipatita ppavattiyā

original: paccayo hotīti etena cittārammaṇasannipātakāraṇaṃ phasso cittārammaṇasannipātoti
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti etena citta ārammaṇa sannipāta kāraṇam phassaḥ citta ārammaṇa sannipāto ti

original: vuttoti dasseti. Phasso hi cittassa ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattito tassa ārammaṇe
analyzed: vuttaḥ ti dasseti phassaḥ hi cittassa ārammaṇe phusana ākārena iva pavattitaḥ tassa ārammaṇe

original: sannipatitappavattiyā paccayoti ca vuccati. Sā cassa phusanākārappavatti sākhagge
analyzed: sannipatita ppavattiyā paccayaḥ ti ca vuccati sā ca ssa phusana ākāra ppavatti sā ākhagge

original: ṭhitaṃ disvā bhūmisaṇṭhitassa avīrakapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, ambilaambapakkādiṃ

original: khādantaṃ disvā mukhe kheḷuppatti, dayālukassa paraṃ haññamānaṃ disvā sarīrakampananti
analyzed: khādantam disvā mukhe kheḷuppatti dayālukassa param haññamānam disvā sarīra kampananti

original: evamādīsu paribyattā hoti. Tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammāti yathā paṭihananavasena aññamaññaṃ

analyzed: āsannataram uppajjamānesu rūpa dhamma visesesu saṅghaṭṭana pariyāyaḥ evam citta ārammaṇānam

analyzed: saṅghaṭṭana pariyāyena vuttaḥ yat āha evam tiādi keci pana saṅghaṭṭana rasaḥ phassaḥ

original: Tena anekasabhāvena kāraṇena āhitavisesaṃ ekampi kammaṃ anekasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nipphādetuṃ

original: samatthaṃ hotīti dasseti. Idāni kammassa vuttappakāravisesābhāve dosamāha “indriyantarābhāvappattito”ti.
analyzed: samattham hoti iti dasseti idāni kammassa vutta ppakāra visesa abhāve dosam āha indriya antara abhāva pattitaḥ ti

original: Tassattho – kāraṇavisesābhāve phalavisesassa asambhavato yaṃ visesayuttaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: tassa atthaḥ kāraṇa visesa abhāve phala visesassa asambhavataḥ yam visesa yuttam kammam

original: cakkhussa kāraṇaṃ, tassa tato aññavisesābhāve tadaññindriyuppādakatāpi na siyāti
analyzed: cakkhussa kāraṇam tassa tatas añña visesa abhāve tad aññindriya uppādaka tā api na siyāti

original: sotindriyādīnaṃ tato anuppatti eva siyā. Evamitaratthāpi. Visesoti cettha kammassa
analyzed: sotindriya ādīnam tatas anuppatti eva siyā evam itaratthā api visesaḥ ti ca ittha kammassa

original: taṃtaṃindriyuppādanasamatthatā adhippetā, sā ca pubbe dassitasabhāvova.
analyzed: taṃ taṃ indriya uppādana samattha tā adhippetā sā ca pubbe dassita sabhāvā uva

original: Anekāhi mahaggatacetanāhi ekāya vā parittacetanāsahitāya paṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpānaṃ
analyzed: anekāhi mahaggata cetanāhi ekāya vā paritta cetanā sahitāya paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: nibbattīti na sakkā viññātunti “sabbesaṃ…pe… viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva asakkuṇeyyataṃ
analyzed: nibbattī iti na sakkā viññātunti viññāyati iti vuttam idāni tam eva

original: vitthārato dassetuṃ “nānācetanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – “paṭisa…pe…
analyzed: vitthārataḥ dassetum nānā cetanāya itiādi vuttam tassa ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ

original: paccayo”ti ettha yadi nānākammavasena indriyānaṃ uppatti adhippetā, evaṃ sati mahaggatakammena
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti ettha yadi nānā kamma vasena indriyānam uppatti adhippetā evam sati mahaggata kammena

original: ca kāmāvacarakammena ca taṃtaṃpaṭisandhikkhaṇe kaṭattārūpaṃ uppannaṃ siyā, na cetaṃ
analyzed: ca kāmāvacara kammena ca taṃ taṃ paṭisandhi kkhaṇe kaṭattā rūpam uppannam siyā na ca etam

original: yuttaṃ “mahaggatacetanā kammapaccayo”ti vuttattā. Nāpi taṃtaṃbhavaniyatarūpindriyehi
analyzed: yuttam mahaggata cetanā kamma paccayaḥ ti vutta ttā nā api taṃ taṃbhava niyata rūpa indriyehi

original: vikalindriyatā gatisampattiyā opapātikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe yuttā. Atha mahaggatāhi
analyzed: vikalindriya tā gati sampattiyā opapātika yoniyam paṭisandhi khaṇe yuttāḥ atha mahaggatāhi

original: eva nānācetanāhi nibbattaṃ, na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hoti. Nicchitañhetaṃ
analyzed: eva nānā cetanāhi nibbattam na cekā paṭisandhi aneka kamma nibbattā hoti nicchitam ha etam

original: sāketapañhenāti. Evaṃ ekena mahaggatakammunā cakkhundriyasotindriyahadayavatthūnaṃ
analyzed: sāketa pañhena ati evam ekena mahaggata kammunā cakkhu indriya sotindriya hadaya vatthūnam

original: uppattiñāpakena iminā vacanena parittakammunāpi ekena yathārahaṃ anekesaṃ indriyānaṃ
analyzed: uppatti ñāpakena iminā vacanena paritta kammunā api ekena yathāraham anekesam indriyānam

original: uppatti siddhāvāti vuttaṃ “siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotī”ti.
analyzed: uppatti siddhau ā ati vuttam siddham ekena kammena aneka indriya uppatti hoti iti

original: Sampattoyeva nāma sampattikiccakaraṇatoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭi…pe… nakato”ti
analyzed: sampattā yā iva nāma sampatti kicca karaṇato ti imam attham dassetum paṭipe na kato ti

original: vuttaṃ. Atisukhumabhāvato maṃsacakkhuagocarena rūpāyatanena samannāgatasaṅghātavuttitāya
analyzed: vuttam ati sukhuma bhāvataḥ maṃsa cakkhu agocarena rūpa āyatanena samannāgata saṅghāta vutti tāya

original: ca “vāyu viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo
analyzed: ca vāyu viya ti vuttam citta samuṭṭhānam sadda āyatanam sota viññāṇassa kadāci pi ārammaṇa paccayo

original: na siyā dhātuparamparāya ghaṭṭentassa utusamuṭṭhānattā. Tenāha “na hi…pe… pajjatī”ti.
analyzed: na siyā dhātu paramparāya ghaṭṭentassa utu samuṭṭhāna ttā tena āha na hipe pajjati iti

original: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāne ca sadda āyatanam sota viññāṇassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ti avisesena vuttam

original: Nanu cirena suyyantīti dūre ṭhitānaṃ lahukaṃ savanaṃ natthi, tesampi vā lahukaṃ savanena
analyzed: nanu cirena suyyanti iti dūre ṭhitānam lahukam savanam na atthi tesam pi vā lahukam savanena

original: dūrāsannabhāvānaṃ viseso na siyāti adhippāyo. Na, dū…pe… toti na dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā
analyzed: dūra āsanna bhāvānam visesaḥ na siyāti adhippāyaḥ na dūpe na dūre ṭhitehi rajaka ādi saddā

original: cirena sotaviññāṇena suyyanti, sace savanūpacāre so saddo dūre āsanne ca ṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: cirena sota viññāṇena sace savana upacāre so saddaḥ dūre āsanne ca ṭhitānam

original: yathābhūte āpāthagate sadde manoviññāṇasaṅkhātato gahaṇavisesato cirena suto sīghaṃ
analyzed: yathābhūte āpātha gate sadde manaḥ viññāṇa saṅkhātataḥ gahaṇa visesataḥ cirena suto sīgham

original: sutoti abhimānoti attho. Etamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Nicchaya…pe…
analyzed: suto ti abhimāno ti attho etam eva attham vitthārataḥ dassentaḥ yathā hi itiādim āha nicchaya pe

original: abhimāno hoti, sotaviññāṇappavatti pana ubhayatthāpi samānā, yasmā so pana saddo…pe…
analyzed: abhimānaḥ hoti sota viññāṇa pavatti pana ubhayattha api samānā yasmā so pana

original: āgacchatīti. Yadi dhātuparamparāya saddo nappavattati, kathaṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ uppattīti
analyzed: āgacchati iti yadi dhātu paramparāya saddo na pavattati katham paṭighosa ādīnam uppatti iti

original: āha “dūre…pe… paccayo hotī”ti. Uppattivasena āgatānīti etena rūpadhammāpi yattha
analyzed: āha dūrepe paccayaḥ hoti iti uppatti vasena āgatāni iti etena rūpa dhammā api

original: uppajjanti, tattheva bhijjanti, na desantaraṃ saṅkamantīti dasseti. Ghaṭṭanasabhāvānevāti
analyzed: uppajjanti tattha eva bhijjanti na desantaram saṅkamanti iti dasseti ghaṭṭana sabhā vān eva ati

original: tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ saddasamuppattihetubhāvamāha. Sotapadesassāti sotadesassa, sotadese ṭhitassāti attho.
analyzed: tesam bhūtānam sadda samuppatti hetu bhāvam āha sota padesassa ati sota desassa sota dese ṭhitassa ati attho

original: Cakkhumato puggalassa ajjhāsayavasenāti citravicitrarūpāyatane yebhuyyena sattānaṃ
analyzed: cakkhumato puggalassa ajjhāsaya vasena ati citra vicitra rūpa āyatane yebhuyyena sattānam

original: cakkhudvārikajavanassa anukaḍḍhanavasena pavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva
analyzed: cakkhu dvārika javanassa anukaḍḍhana vasena pavattim sandhāya vuttam

original: pavattanatoti etena adhiṭṭhānato bahiddhā indriyaṃ pavattīti vādaṃ paṭisedheti. Adhiṭṭhānadese
analyzed: pavattanato ti etena adhiṭṭhānataḥ bahiddhā indriyam pavatti iti vādam paṭisedheti adhiṭṭhāna dese

original: eva hi indriyaṃ vattati tattha kiccādippayogadassanato. Satipi panassa bahiddhā vuttiyaṃ
analyzed: eva hi indriyam vattati tattha kicca ādi ppayoga dassanato sati pi panassa bahiddhā vuttiyam

original: na visayaggahaṇe samatthatā, aññathā adhiṭṭhānapidahanepi visayaggahaṇaṃ bhaveyyāti.
analyzed: na visaya ggahaṇe samattha tā aññathā adhiṭṭhāna pidahane pi visaya ggahaṇam bhaveyya ti

original: Ārammaṇaggahaṇahetuto cāti kaṇṇakūpacchiddeyeva ṭhatvā ārammaṇakaraṇassa viññāṇassa vā hetubhāvato.
analyzed: ārammaṇa ggahaṇa hetuto ca ati ārammaṇa karaṇassa viññāṇassa vā hetu bhāvato

original: Tabbohārenāti gandhagandhaggahaṇassa sahacaritāya gandhopi tathā vuttoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tad bohārena āti gandha gandha ggahaṇassa sahacaritāya gandhaḥ api tathā vuttaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Gandho paccayoti gandho sahakārīpaccayoti attho. Kheḷādiko paccayoti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: gandho paccayo ti gandho sahakārī paccayo ti attho kheḷa ādiko paccayo ti yojetabbam

original: Tathā pathavīti sahakārīpaccayantarabhūtā ajjhattikabāhirā pathavī ārammaṇaggahaṇe
analyzed: tathā pathavī iti sahakārī paccaya antara bhūtā ajjhattika bāhirā pathavī ārammaṇa ggahaṇe

original: paccayoti attho. Ādhārabhūtāti tejovāyodhātūnaṃ ādhārabhūtā. Nissayabhūtānanti nissayamahābhūtānaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti atthaḥ ādhāra bhūtā ati tejaḥ vāyaḥ dhātūnam ādhāra bhūtā nissaya bhūtānam ti nissaya mahābhūtānam

original: āpotejovāyodhātūnaṃ. Sabbadāti uppīḷanakāle ca anuppīḷanakāle ca. Tatthāti caturāsītipabhede
analyzed: āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyaḥ dhātūnam uppīḍana kāle ca an uppīḍana kāle ca tattha ati

original: uparimakāyasaṅkhāte rūpasamūhe. Vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānanti idaṃ cakkhudasakaṃ
analyzed: uparima kāya saṅkhāte rūpa samūhe vinibbhujjitum idam cakkhu dasakam

original: idaṃ kāyadasakaṃ idaṃ bhāvadasakanti evaṃ kalāpatopi vinibbhujjituṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ.
analyzed: idam kāya dasakam idam bhāva dasakam ti evam kalāpataḥ api vinibbhujjitum

original: 616. Dīghādīnaṃ phusitvā jānitabbatoti idaṃ dīghādīnaṃ na kāyaviññāṇagocarattā vuttaṃ,
analyzed: dīgha ādīnam phusitvā jānitabbato ti idam dīgha ādīnam na kāya viññāṇa gocara ttā vuttam

original: dīghādivohārarūpādīnaṃ pana phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattena
analyzed: dīgha ādi vohāra rūpa ādīnam pana phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā kāya viññāṇa vīthiyā paratas pavattena

original: manoviññāṇenapi jānitabbattā vuttaṃ. Dīghādisannivesanti dīghādisannivesavantaṃ.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇena api jānitabba ttā vuttam dīgha ādi sannivesam ti dīgha ādi sannivesavantam

original: Ekasmiṃ itarassa abhāvāti chāyātapānaṃ ālokandhakārānañca asahaṭṭhāyitaṃ āha. Kathaṃ
analyzed: ekasmin itarassa abhāvāti chāyā ātapānam āloka ndhakāra anañca āha katham

original: pana āloko andhakāraṃ vidhamatīti? “Ālokappavattisamānakālaṃ andhakārasabhāvena pavattamānaṃ
analyzed: pana ālokaḥ andhakāram vidhamati iti āloka ppavatti samāna kālam andhakāra sabhāvena pavattamānam

original: vaṇṇāyatanaṃ bhijjati. Andhakārassa nissayo hutvā pavattamānāni bhūtāni kamena tathārūpassa
analyzed: vaṇṇa āyatanam bhijjati andhakārassa nissayaḥ hutvā pavattamānāni bhūtāni kamena tathārūpassa

original: vaṇṇāyatanassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantī”ti keci. Saha andhakārena tannissayabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇa āyatanassa nissaya bhāvam gacchanti iti keci saha andhakārena tad nissaya bhūtānam

original: nirodhasamanantaraṃ taṃsantatiyaṃ tādise paccayasannipāte ālokanissayabhūtānaṃ uppattīti
analyzed: nirodha samanantaram tad santatiyam tādise paccaya sannipāte āloka nissaya bhūtānam uppatti iti

original: veditabbaṃ. Na hi nissayamahābhūtehi vinā ālokappavatti atthi, nāpi andhakārasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam na hi nissaya mahābhūtehi vinā āloka ppavatti atthi na api andhakāra saṅkhātam

original: vaṇṇāyatanameva nirujjhati taṃnissayehi payujjamānakaekakalāpabhūtopādārūpānaṃ saheva
analyzed: vaṇṇa āyatanam eva nirujjhati tad nissayehi saha iva

original: nirujjhanato. Padīpasikhāmaṇiraṃsiyo viya pathavīpākārarukkhādīni muñcitvāpi andhakāro
analyzed: nirujjhanataḥ padīpa sikhāmaṇi raṃsiyaḥ viya pathavī pākāra rukkha ādīni muñcitvā api andhakāraḥ

original: pavattatīti vadanti. Mandaṃ pana pākārādiādhārarahitaṃ na suṭṭhu paññāyati, bahalaṃ
analyzed: pavattati iti vadanti mandam pana pākāra ādi ādhāra rahitam na suṭṭhu paññāyati bahalam

original: ādhāraṃ nissāya pavattatīti yuttanti ca vadanti.
analyzed: ādhāram nissāya pavattati iti yuttam ti ca vadanti

original: 620. “Amanussasaddo”ti ettha a-kāro na manussatāmattanivattiattho sadisabhāvadīpanatāya
analyzed: amanussa saddaḥ ti ettha akāraḥ na sadisa bhāva dīpana tāya

original: anadhippetattā, manussato pana anaññatānivattiatthoti dassetuṃ “amanussa…pe… ṭṭhādayopī”ti
analyzed: an adhippeta ttā manussato pana anañña tā nivatti atthaḥ ti dassetum a manussape ṭṭha ādayaḥ api iti

original: āha. Tathā kittetabboti “vaṃsaphālanasaddo”tiādinā vatthuvasena kittetabbo.
analyzed: āha tathā kittetabbo ti vaṃsa phālana saddo ti ādinā vatthu vasena kittetabbo

original: 632. Kammacittādināti ādi-saddena utuāhāre saṅgaṇhāti. Taṃtadākārānīti itthiliṅgādiākārāni.
analyzed: kamma citta ādinā ti ādi saddena utu āhāre saṅgaṇhāti taṃ tad ākārāni iti itthi liṅga ādi ākārāni

original: Itthindriyaṃ paṭicca samuṭṭhahantīti aññamaññapaccayānipi itthiliṅgādīni yebhuyyena
analyzed: itthi indriyam paṭicca samuṭṭhahanti iti aññamañña paccayāni pi itthi liṅga ādīni yebhuyyena

original: itthindriyasahite eva santāne sabbhāvā itarattha ca abhāvā indriyahetukāni vuttāni.
analyzed: itthi indriya sahite eva santāne sabbhāvāḥ itarattha ca abhāvāḥ indriya hetukāni vuttāni

original: Aññathāti itthiliṅgādiākārato aññathā, itthindriyābhāve vā. Itthiggahaṇassa cāti
analyzed: aññathā ti itthi liṅga ādi ākārataḥ aññathā itthi indriya abhāve vā itthi ggahaṇassa ca ati

original: itthīti cittappavattiyā. Tesaṃ rūpānanti itthiliṅgādiākārarūpānaṃ. Yadi itthindriyaṃ
analyzed: itthī iti citta ppavattiyā tesam rūpānan ti itthi liṅga ādi ākāra rūpānam yadi itthi indriyam

original: itthiliṅgādiākārarūpānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, atha kasmā tassa indriyādipaccayabhāvo
analyzed: sahakārīkāraṇam atha kasmā tassa indriya ādi paccaya bhāvo

original: tesaṃ na vuttoti? Neva taṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, atha kho tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitāmattena
analyzed: tesam na vuttaḥ ti na iva tam sahakārīkāraṇam atha kho tesam tad bhāva bhāvi tā mattena

original: taṃ kāraṇanti vuccatīti dassetuṃ āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
analyzed: tam kāraṇam ti vuccati iti dassetum āha yasmā pana atiādi

original: 633. Liṅgaṃ parivattamānaṃ purimaliṅgādhārajātianurūpameva hutvā parivattatīti katvā
analyzed: liṅgam parivattamānam purima liṅga ādhāra jāti anurūpam eva hutvā parivattati iti katvā

original: vuttaṃ “paṭisandhiyaṃ viya pavattepī”ti. Yassa…pe… noti ādivacanatoti ādi-saddena
analyzed: vuttam paṭisandhiyam viya pavatte pi iti yassa pe na iti ādi vacanataḥ ti ādi saddena

original: “yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti no”ti saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: yassa vā pana purisa indriyam uppajjati tassa itthi indriyam uppajjati iti no ti saṅgaṇhāti

original: 635. Dvārabhāvena kucchitānaṃ āsavadhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya pasādavisese viya
analyzed: dvāra bhāvena kucchitānam āsava dhammānam pavatti ṭṭhāna tāya pasāda visese viya

original: viññattivisesepi kāyavohārappavatti daṭṭhabbā. Vitthambhanasabhāvatāya vāyodhātuyā
analyzed: viññatti visese pi kāya vohāra ppavatti daṭṭhabbā vitthambhana sabhāva tāya vāyodhātuyā

original: thambhanaṃ “vāyodhātukicca”nti vuttaṃ. Kiccampi hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvoyevāti. Pathavīdhātuyā
analyzed: thambhanam vāyo dhātu kiccan ti vuttam kiccam pi hi dhammānam pathavī dhātuyā

original: ākāro vacīviññattīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: ākāraḥ vacī viññattī iti vattum vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 636. Vitakka…pe… gahitāti yathādhippetatthābhibyañjikāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpanādhippāyappavattiṃ
analyzed: vitakka pe gahitā ati yathā adhippeta ttha abhibyañjikāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpana adhippāya ppavattim

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tadā hi sā tehi pariggahitā nāma hotīti. Ekassapi akkharassa anekehi
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam tadā hi sā tehi pariggahitā nāma hoti iti ekassa api akkharassa anekehi

original: javanehi nibbattetabbattā tathā nibbattiyamānatāya asamatthasabhāvattā na viññātavisesā
analyzed: javanehi nibbattetabba ttā tathā nibbattiyamāna tāya asamattha sabhāva ttā na viññāta visesā

original: na bhinnā evāti āha “sava…pe… bhinnā”ti. Abbokiṇṇeti antarantarā uppajjamānehi asaṃsaṭṭhe.
analyzed: na bhinnā eva iti āha sa vape bhinnā iti abbokiṇṇā iti antar antarā uppajjamānehi a saṃsaṭṭhe

original: “Pacchimacitta”nti avisesena cuticittaṃ vuttanti adhippāyena “aññesampi cuticittaṃ…pe… ñāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pacchimacittam ti avisesena cuti cittam vuttanti adhippāyena aññesam pi ñāyati iti vuttam

original: Atha vā “ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
analyzed: atha vā ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cavantānam

original: tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī”ti rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ
analyzed: tesam vacī saṅkhāraḥ nirujjhissati no ca tesam kāya saṅkhāraḥ nirujjhissati iti rūpa arūpa bhava upapad janakānam

969. Tadidaṃ nayakaraṇaṃ chabbidhādīsu tīsu saṅgahesu yojitaṃ.

original: aniccattādayo vā “aniccādayo”ti vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: anicca tta ādayaḥ vā anicca ādayaḥ ti vuttā iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Avasesakilesā kilesasotaṃ. Ñāṇanti yāthāvato jānanaṃ. Yathābhūtāvabodhena hi tassa
analyzed: avasesa kilesā kilesa sotam yāthāvataḥ jānanam yathā bhūta avabodhena hi tassa

original: tāni anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditatāya santāne appavesārahāni “saṃvutāni pihitānī”ti
analyzed: tāni an uppatti dhamma tam āpādita tāya santāne appa vesārahāni saṃvutāni pihitāni iti

original: ca vuccanti. Tathāti sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ vippakārassa khamanākārena. Aviparītadhammā
analyzed: ca vuccanti tathā ati sabba saṅkhārānam vippakārassa khamana ākārena aviparīta dhammā

original: etāya nijjhāyaṃ khamantīti paññā khantīti. Aduṭṭhasseva titikkhābhāvato tathāpavattā
analyzed: etāya nijjhāyam khamanti iti paññā khanti iti aduṭṭhassa iva titikkhā bhāvato tathā pavattā

original: khandhāti adosappadhānā khandhā vuttāti “adoso eva vā”ti tatiyo vikappo vutto. Satipaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: khandhā ati adosa ppadhānā khandhā vuttā ati adosaḥ eva vā ti tatiyaḥ vikappaḥ vutto sati paṭipakkha ttā

original: abhijjhādomanassānaṃ “muṭṭhassacca”nti vuttā. Akkhanti doso. Sassatādiantavinimuttā
analyzed: abhijjhā domanassānam vuttā doso sassata ādi anta vinimuttā

original: dhammaṭṭhitīti sassatucchedādigāho tappaṭilomabhāvo vutto. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādo
analyzed: dhamma ṭṭhiti iti tad paṭiloma bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ diṭṭhadhamma nibbāna vādaḥ

original: nibbāne paṭilomabhāvo. Carimānulomañāṇavajjhataṇhādiko kilesoti vutto, paṭipadāñāṇadassanañāṇadassanāni
analyzed: nibbāne paṭiloma bhāvaḥ carima anuloma ñāṇa vajjha taṇhā ādikaḥ kilesaḥ iti vuttaḥ paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana ñāṇa dassanāni

original: viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ kilesānaṃ appavattikaraṇabhāvena vattati, kilesavisayātilaṅghanabhāvena
analyzed: viya gotra bhuñāṇam kilesānam appavatti karaṇa bhāvena vattati kilesa visaya atilaṅghana bhāvena

original: pana pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “saṅkhāra…pe… pahāna”nti.
analyzed: pana pavattati iti katvā vuttam saṅkhāra pe pahānam iti

original: Diṭṭhiyādīnaṃ samudayasabhāgatā kammassa vikuppādane sahakārīkāraṇabhāvo, dassanādibyāpāraṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhi yā ādīnam samudaya sabhā ga tā kammassa vikuppādane sahakārī kāraṇa bhāvaḥ dassana ādi byāpāram

original: vā attānañca dassanādikiccaṃ cakkhādīnanti evañhi yathātakkitaṃ attānaṃ rūpanti gaṇhāti.
analyzed: vā attānam ca dassana ādi kiccam cakkha ādīnam ti evam hi yathā ātakkitam attānam rūpanti gaṇhāti

original: Yathādiṭṭhanti takkadassanena yathopaladdhanti adhippāyo. Na hi diṭṭhigatiko rūpāyatanameva
analyzed: yathā ādiṭṭhanti takka dassanena yathā upaladdhanti adhippāyaḥ na hi diṭṭhigatikaḥ rūpa āyatanam eva

original: attāti gaṇhātīti. Imissāpavattiyāti sāmaññena rūpaṃ attāti sabbasaṅgāhakabhūtāya
analyzed: attā iti gaṇhāti iti imissā apavattiyā ati sāmaññena rūpam attā iti sabba saṅgāhaka bhūtāya

original: pavattiyā. Rūpe…pe… mānanti cakkhādīsu taṃsabhāvo attāti pavattamānaṃ attaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pavattiyā cakkha ādīsu taṃsa bhāvaḥ attā ati pavattamānam atta ggahaṇam

original: Anaññattādiggahaṇanti anaññattaṃ attaniyaattanissitaattādhāratāgahaṇaṃ. Vaṇṇādīnanti
analyzed: anaññatta ādi gahaṇam ti anaññattam atta niya atta nissita atta ādhāra tā gahaṇam vaṇṇa ādīnam ti

original: vaṇṇarukkhapupphamaṇīnaṃ. Nanu ca rukkhapupphamaṇiyo paramatthato na vijjanti? Saccaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇa rukkha puppha maṇīnam nanu ca rukkha puppha maṇiyaḥ paramatthataḥ na vijjanti saccam

original: na vijjanti, tadupādānaṃ pana vijjatīti taṃ samuditādippakāraṃ idha rukkhādipariyāyena
analyzed: na vijjanti tad upādānam pana vijjati iti tam samudita ādi ppakāram idha rukkha ādi pariyāyena

original: vuttanti rukkhādinidassanepi na doso chāyārukkhādīnaṃ viya rūpassa attano ca saṃsāmibhāvādimattassa adhippetattā.
analyzed: vuttam ti rukkha ādi nidassane pi na doso chāyā rukkha ādīnam viya rūpassa attano ca saṃsāmi bhāva ādimattassa adhippeta ttā

original: 1008. Jātiādisabhāvanti jātibhavādīnaṃ nibbattinibbattanādisabhāvaṃ, uppādanasamatthatā paccayabhāvo.
analyzed: jāti ādi sabhāvanti jāti bhava ādīnam nibbatti nibbattana ādi sabhāvam uppādana samattha tā paccaya bhāvaḥ

original: 1009. Sāmaññena “tadekaṭṭhā kilesā”ti, parato “avaseso lobho”tiādivacanato pārisesato
analyzed: sāmaññena tad ekaṭṭhā kilesā ati paratas avasesaḥ lobha uti ādi vacanato pārisesato

original: sāmatthiyato vā labbhamānatāya satipi āgatatte sarūpena pabhedena vā diṭṭhiādayo
analyzed: vā labbhamāna tāya satipi āgata tte sarūpena pa bhedena vā diṭṭhi ādayaḥ

original: viya anāgatattā lobhādayo “anāgatā”ti vuttāti āha “idha …pe… ssetu”nti. Atthato viññāyati
analyzed: viya anāgata ttā lobha ādayaḥ anāgatā ti vuttā ati āha idha pe ssetunti atthataḥ viññāyati

original: lobhādīhi sahajātā hutvā diṭṭhiyā eva pāḷiyaṃ vuttakilesabhāvato. Itipi attho yujjati
analyzed: lobha ādīhi sahajātāḥ hutvā diṭṭhiyāḥ eva atthaḥ yujjati

original: saṃyojanakilesānampi paṭiniddesārahattā sampayuttasamuṭṭhānabhāvato ca. Saṃyojanarahitehīti
analyzed: saṃyojana kilesānam pi paṭiniddesa araha ttā sampayutta samuṭṭhāna bhāvato ca saṃyojana rahitehi iti

original: saṃyojanabhāvarahitehi thinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi, thinaahirikānottappehi vā.
analyzed: saṃyojana bhāva rahitehi thina auddhacca ahirika anottappehi thina ahirika anottappehi vā

original: 1013. Ekade…pe… vadati avayavenapi samudāyo vuccatīti. Hetu etesaṃ atthīti vā hetukā.
analyzed: vadati avayavena api samudāyaḥ vuccati iti hetu etesam atthi iti vā hetukā

original: Aniyatoti na avadhārito. Purimapadāvadhāraṇavasena gahetabbatthattā vivaraṇīyatthavā.
analyzed: aniyataḥ iti na avadhāritaḥ purima pada avadhāraṇa vasena gahetabba tthattā

original: Atthato nikkhipitunti “tayo kusalahetū alobho adoso amoho”tiādīsu viya purimanayena
analyzed: atthataḥ nikkhipitunti tayo kusala hetū a lobhaḥ a dosaḥ a mohaḥ iti ādīsu purima nayena

original: dassitadhammeyeva hetupahātabbahetukabhedato atthadassanavasena niddisitunti attho.
analyzed: dassita dhammā iya iva hetu pahātabba hetuka bhedataḥ attha dassana vasena niddisitunti atthaḥ

original: 1029. Abhiññāyuttavajjānaṃ mahaggatānaṃ parittārammaṇattābhāvā “mahaggatā vā iddhividhādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Atītaṃsañāṇassa kāmāvacarattā “ceto…pe… ñāṇasampayuttā”ti āha.
analyzed: abhiññā yuttavajjānam mahaggatānam paritta ārammaṇa tta abhāvāḥ mahaggatāḥ vā iddhividha ādayaḥ ti vuttam atītaṃsa ñāṇassa kāma avacara ttā cetas upe ñāṇa sampayuttā ti āha

original: 1035. Anantare niyuttānīti cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ, tasmiṃ niyuttāni taṃ ekantena
analyzed: anantare niyuttāni iti cuti anantaram phalam anantaram tasmin niyuttāni tam ekantena

original: nipphādanato anatikkamanakānīti attho. Vuttappakārassa anantarassa karaṇaṃ anantaraṃ,
analyzed: nipphādanataḥ an atikkamanakāni iti atthaḥ vutta ppakārassa anantarassa karaṇam anantaram

original: taṃ sīlānīti yojetabbaṃ. Anekesu ānantariyesu katesu kiñcāpi balavatoyeva paṭisandhidānaṃ,
analyzed: tam sīlāni iti yojetabbam anekesu ānantariyesu katesu kiñca api balavataḥ yā iva paṭisandhi dānam

original: na itaresaṃ, attanā pana kātabbakiccassa teneva katattā tassa vipākassa upatthambhanavasena
analyzed: na itaresam attanā pana kātabba kiccassa tena iva kata ttā tassa vipākassa upatthambhana vasena

original: pavattanato na itarāni tena nivāritaphalāni nāma honti, ko pana vādo paṭipakkhesu
analyzed: pavattanataḥ na itarāni tena nivārita phalāni nāma honti kaḥ pana vādaḥ paṭipakkhesu

original: kusalesūti vuttaṃ “paṭipakkhena anivāraṇīyaphalattā”ti. “Anekasmimpi…pe… natthī”ti
analyzed: kusalesu iti vuttam paṭipakkhena a nivāraṇīya phala ttā ati natthi iti

original: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu anekesu ānantariyesu katesu balavaṃyeva paṭisandhidāyakanti tena
analyzed: kasmā vuttam nanu anekesu ānantariyesu katesu balavan yā iva paṭisandhi dāyakan ti tena

original: itaresaṃ vipāko paṭibāhito hotīti āha “na ca tesa”ntiādi. Tañca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: itaresam vipākaḥ paṭibāhitaḥ hoti iti āha na ca tesam tiādi tat ca tesam aññam aññam

original: appaṭibāhakattaṃ mātikāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthārena vicāritameva.
analyzed: appaṭibāhaka ttam mātikā vaṇṇanā ayam vitthārena vicāritam eva

original: Atthato āpannaṃ aggahetvā yathārutavaseneva pāḷiyā atthaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vādānaṃ tapparabhāvena
analyzed: atthataḥ āpannam aggahetvā yathāruta vasena iva pāḷiyāḥ attham gahetvā tesam vādānam tad para bhāvena

original: pavattiṃ sandhāya ahetukavādādīnaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “purimavādo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aniyyānikaniyyānikabhedaṃ
analyzed: pavattim sandhāya ahetuka vāda ādīnam visesam dassetum purima vādaḥ tiādi vuttam aniyyānika niyyānika bhedam

original: pana sambhārakammaṃ bandhamokkhahetūti bandhamokkhahetuṃ paṭisedhentopi kammaṃ paṭisedheti.
analyzed: pana sambhāra kammam bandha mokkha hetu uti bandha mokkha hetum paṭisedhentaḥ api kammam paṭisedheti

original: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana vipākassa kammakilesasamādhipaññānaṃ hetubhāvato vipākopi
analyzed: sumaṅgalavilāsiniyam pana vipākassa kamma kilesa samādhi paññānam hetu bhāvataḥ vipākaḥ api

original: bandhamokkhahetūti “natthi hetūti vadanto ubhayaṃ paṭibāhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kammaṃ
analyzed: bandha mokkha hetū ti natthi hetū ti vadantaḥ ubhayam paṭibāhati iti vuttam tattha kammaṃ

original: paṭisedhentenapi vipāko paṭisedhito hoti, vipākaṃ paṭisedhentenapi kammanti tayopi
analyzed: paṭisedhentena api vipākaḥ paṭisedhitaḥ hoti vipākam paṭisedhentena api tayā upi

original: ete vādā atthato ubhayapaṭisedhakāti veditabbā. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhinti ahetukavādādipaṭisaṃyutte
analyzed: ete vādāḥ atthataḥ ubhaya paṭisedhakā ati veditabbā niyatam icchā diṭṭhim ti ahetuka vāda ādi paṭisaṃyutte

original: asaddhamme uggahaparipucchāvinicchayapasutassa “natthi hetū”tiādinā raho nisīditvā
analyzed: asat dhamme uggaha paripucchā vinicchaya pasutassa na atthi hetu uti ādinā rahaḥ nisīditvā

original: cintentassa tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, javanāni
analyzed: cintentassa tasmin ārammaṇe micchā sati santiṭṭhati cittam ekaggam hoti javanāni

original: javanti. Paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsu. Sattame atekicchabhāvaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama javane sa tekicchaḥ hoti tathā dutiya ādīsu sattame atekiccha bhāvam

original: patto nāma hoti. Yā evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “niyatamicchādiṭṭhi”nti.
analyzed: pattaḥ nāma hoti yā evam pavattā diṭṭhi tam sandhāya vuttam niyatam icchā diṭṭhin ti

original: Tato purimabhāvā aniyatā.
analyzed: tatas purima bhāvāḥ aniyatā

original: 1039. Sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatādivisiṭṭhabhāvepi maggapaccayassa sampayogavisiṭṭhatādīpaneneva
sahajātādivisiṭṭhatāpi viññāyatīti pāḷiyaṃ “sampayutto”ti vuttanti “sampayogavisiṭṭhenā”ti
analyzed: sahajāta ādi visiṭṭha tā api viññāyati iti pāḷiyam sampayuttaḥ iti vuttam ti sampayoga visiṭṭhena ati

original: vuttaṃ. Magga…pe… dassetuṃ, na pana maggaṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ maggapaccayabhāvābhāvatoti
analyzed: vuttam magga pe dassetum na pana magga aṅgānam aññam aññam magga paccaya bhāva abhāvato

original: adhippāyo. Evaṃ satīti yadi maggaṅgānaṃ maggapaccayalābhitāya pakāsano paṭhamanayo,
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ evam sati iti yadi maggaṅgānam magga paccaya lābhi tāya

original: evaṃ sante. Maggaṅgānipi vedanādayo viya maggahetukabhāvena vattabbattā amaggasabhāvānaṃ
analyzed: evam sante maggaṅgāni api vedanā ādayaḥ viya magga hetuka bhāvena vattabba ttā amagga sabhāvānam

original: alobhādīnaṃ tadaññesaṃ tadubhayasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayabhāvadīpane tatiyanaye
analyzed: alobha ādīnam tad aññesam tad ubhaya sabhāvānam dhammānam paccaya bhāva dīpane tatiya naye

original: viya na ṭhapetabbānīti āha “ṭhapetvāti na vattabbaṃ siyā”ti. Pubbeti purimanaye.
analyzed: viya na ṭhapetabbāni iti āha ṭhapetvā iti na vattabbam siyā iti pubba iti purima naye

original: Dutiyanayepīti pi-saddena paṭhamanayaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tena sammādiṭṭhiyā purimasmiṃ
analyzed: dutiya naye pi iti pi saddena paṭhama nayam sampiṇḍeti tena sammādiṭṭhiyā purimasmin

original: nayadvaye ṭhapitattā tassa sahetukabhāvadassano tatiyanayo āraddhoti dasseti. Tatiyanaye
analyzed: naya dvaye ṭhapita ttā tassa sa hetuka bhāva dassano tatiya nayaḥ āraddho ti dasseti tatiya naye

original: sammādiṭṭhiyā sahetukabhāvadassanaṃ anicchanto codako “kathaṃ dassito”ti codetvā
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhiyā sa hetuka bhāva dassanam an icchanto codako katham dassito ti codetvā

original: “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ vivarati. Itaro “yathā hī”tiādinā dassanena pahātabbahetubhāvena
analyzed: nanu iti ādinā attanaḥ adhippāyam vivarati itaraḥ yathā hi iti ādinā dassanena pahātabba hetu bhāvena

original: vuttānampi lobhādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ sahajekaṭṭhasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannato
analyzed: vuttānam api lobha ādīnam aññam aññam sahajā ikaṭṭha sampayutta saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannataḥ

original: dassanena pahātabbahetukasaṅgaho viya maggahetubhāvena vuttāyapi sammādiṭṭhiyā maggahetukabhāvopi
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetuka saṅgahaḥ viya magga hetu bhāvena vuttāya api sammādiṭṭhiyā magga hetuka bhāvaḥ api

original: yujjati maggahetusampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannabhāvatoti dasseti.
analyzed: yujjati magga hetu sampayutta saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpanna bhāvato ti dasseti

original: Tato aññassevāti tato sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātahetuto aññassa alobhādosasseva. Aññenāti
analyzed: tatas aññassa iva ati tatas sammādiṭṭhi saṅkhāta hetutaḥ aññassa alobha adosassa iva aññena ati

original: “maggo hetū”ti ito aññena. Alobhādosānaṃyeva adhippetattā tesaṃyeva āveṇikena maggahetūti
analyzed: maggaḥ hetu uti itas aññena alobha adosānaṃ yeva adhippetattā tesam yeva āveṇikena magga hetu uti

original: iminā pariyāyena. Sādhāraṇena pariyāyenāti tiṇṇampi hetūnaṃ adhippetattā maggāmaggasabhāvānaṃ
analyzed: iminā pariyāyena sādhāraṇena pariyāyena ati tiṇṇam pi hetūnam adhippeta ttā magga amagga sabhāvānam

original: sādhāraṇena maggahetumaggahetūti iminā pariyāyena. Tesanti hetūnaṃ. Aññesanti hetusampayuttānaṃ.
analyzed: sādhāraṇena magga hetu magga hetū ti iminā pariyāyena tesanti hetūnam aññesanti hetu sampayuttānam

original: Atthavisesavasenāti “maggahetukā”ti pāḷiyā atthavisesavasena. Amohena alobhādosāmohehi
analyzed: attha visesa vasena ati magga hetukā ati pāḷiyā attha visesa vasena amohena alobha adosa amohehi

original: ca sesadhammānaṃ sahetukabhāvadassanavasena pavattā dutiyatatiyanayā “sarūpato hetuhetumantadassana”nti
analyzed: ca sesa dhammānam sahetuka bhāva dassana vasena pavattā dutiya tatiya nayā sarūpataḥ hetu hetumanta dassanan ti

original: vuttā. Tathāadassanatoti sarūpena adassanato. Atthena…pe… gamanatoti “maggaṅgāni
analyzed: vuttā tathā adassanato ti sarūpena adassanato gamanato ti maggaṅgāni

original: ṭhapetvā taṃsampayutto”ti vacanato maggasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ maggapaccayatāsaṅkhāto
analyzed: ṭhapetvā tad sampayuttaḥ ti vacanataḥ magga sabhāvānam dhammānam magga paccaya tā saṅkhāto

original: sampayuttānaṃ hetubhāvo sarūpato dassito. Maggahetubhūtāya pana sammādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: sampayuttānam hetu bhāvaḥ sarūpataḥ dassitaḥ magga hetu bhūtāya pana sammādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttānam

original: hetuhetubhāvo atthato ñāpito hotīti attho.
analyzed: hetu hetu bhāvaḥ atthataḥ ñāpitaḥ hoti iti attho

original: 1040. Asabhāvadhammo garukātabbo na hotīti “sabhāvadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Teneva paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ
analyzed: asabhāva dhammaḥ garu kātabbaḥ na hoti iti sabhāva dhammaḥ ti vuttam tena iva paṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā ayam

original: “ārammaṇādhipati jātibhedato kusalākusalavipākakiriyarūpanibbānavasena chabbidho”ti
analyzed: ārammaṇa adhipati jāti bhedato kusala akusala vipāka kiriya rūpa nibbāna vasena chabbidhaḥ ti

original: vakkhati. Maggādīni ṭhapetvāti maggādīni pahāya. Aññesanti maggādito aññesaṃ. Adhi…pe…
analyzed: vakkhati magga ādīni ṭhapetvā ti magga ādīni pahāya aññesanti magga āditaḥ aññesam adhipe

original: vassāti ārammaṇādhipatipaccayabhāvassa. Paññuttarattā kusalānaṃ lokuttarakathāya
analyzed: vassa ati ārammaṇa adhipati paccaya bhāvassa paññuttara ttā kusalānam lokuttara kathāya

original: ca paññādhurattā vīmaṃsādhipatissa sesādhipatīnaṃ padhānatā veditabbā.

original: uddhaṭattā. Avassañcetamevaṃ viññātabbaṃ, itarathā rūpārūpabhavesu ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatassapi
analyzed: viññātabbam itarathā rūpa arūpa bhavesu uccheda diṭṭhi sahagatassa api

original: lobhassa bhavāsavabhāvo āpajjeyyāti. Kāmāsavādayo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikāsavabhāvena dvidhā vuttā.
analyzed: lobhassa bhava āsava bhāvaḥ āpajjeyya iti kāma āsava ādayaḥ eva diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika āsava bhāvena dvidhā vuttā

original: 1103. Idha pāḷiyāpi bhavāsavavinimuttalobhassa kāmāsavabhāvo na na sakkā yojetunti dassetuṃ “kāmāsavaniddese cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Dhammacchando saddhā”ti keci.
analyzed: idha bhava āsava vinimutta lobhassa kāma āsava bhāvaḥ na na sakkā yojetun ti dassetum kāma āsava niddese ca atiādi vuttam dhammacchando saddhā ati keci

original: 1105. Upādānakkhandhesveva pavattati tabbinimuttassa dhammassa jīvaggahaṇavisayassa
analyzed: upādāna khandhesu eva pavattati tad vinimuttassa dhammassa jīva ggahaṇa visayassa

original: paramatthato abhāvā. Rūpe…pe… viññāṇe vā pana na patiṭṭhāti rūpādīnaṃ aviparītasabhāvamatte
analyzed: paramatthataḥ abhāvāḥ viññāṇe vā pana na patiṭṭhāti rūpa ādīnam aviparīta sabhāva matte

original: aṭṭhatvā sayaṃ samāropitassa tesu parikappanāmattasiddhassa kassaci ākārassa abhinivesanato.
analyzed: a ṭhatvā sayam samāropitassa tesu parikappanā matta siddhassa kassaci ākārassa abhinivesanato

original: Tenevāha “tato aññaṃ katvā”ti. Tato upādānakkhandhato. Vedanādayopi hi keci diṭṭhigatikā

original: aniccāti passantīti. Tatoti vā sarīrasaṅkhātarūpakkhandhato. “Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti
analyzed: aniccā ati passanti iti tatas ti vā sarīra saṅkhāta rūpa kkhandhato aññam jīvam aññam sarīranti

original: hi vuttaṃ. Hotīti bhavati sassataṃ attāti attho. Aññanti brahmaissarādito aññaṃ.
analyzed: hi vuttam hoti iti bhavati sassatam attā iti atthaḥ aññanti brahmaissara āditaḥ aññam

original: Arūpabhavo viya rūparāgappahānena rūpabhavo kāmarāgappahānena pattabbo. Rūpībrahmānañca

analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇikaḥ rāgaḥ pahīyati na vimāna ādīsu rāgaḥ iti saḥ akāma rāgaḥ iti katvā kāma āsavaḥ

original: sabbo lobho kāmāsavoti dassito. Tattha yuttaṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. Siyā āsavasampayutto
analyzed: sabbaḥ lobho kāma āsavaḥ ti dassito tattha yuttam vicāretvā gahetabbam siyā āsava sampayutto

original: Puggalavisesanti seyyassa seyyotiādibhedaṃ puggalavisesaṃ. Seyyaṃ bhinditvā pavattamāno

analyzed: a nissāya vuttānam seyya ādi vasena attanaḥ mananam paggahaḥ māno tassa karaṇam seyya uham asmi iti ādi pavattiyā iva ati

analyzed: vuttam seyyo ti ādi kicca karaṇam ti

original: 1140. Sabbopi lobho abhijjhāsabhāvoti abhijjhā āsavadvayasabhāvā, kāmarāgo kāmāsavasabhāvo

analyzed: yathārūpe rūpa ppabandhe vattamāne puggalaḥ gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati iti vuccati

original: 1163. Vipakkhepi bhāvato anekantikattā rūpattāsādhakattaṃ. Garubhāvappatti lahutāviraho

original: 1318. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ādīnavapaṭicchādanato tadassādanābhinandanato ca vaṭṭassa mūlaṃ padhānakāraṇanti vaṭṭamūlaṃ.

analyzed: dosa moha ahirika anottappehi dosa moha thina ahirika anottappehi moha vicikicchā ahirika anottappehi

original: mohaahirikānottappehi ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: moha ahirika anottappehi ekatas uppajjati

original: Yathā ca uddhaccaṃ, evaṃ ahirikānottappāni ca yojetvā veditabbāni. Kathaṃ? Ahirikaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca uddhaccam evam ahirika anottappāni ca yojetvā veditabbāni katham ahirikam

original: lobhamohadiṭṭhiuddhaccānottappehi, lobhamohadiṭṭhithinauddhaccānottappehi, lobhamohamānauddhaccānottappehi,
analyzed: lobha moha diṭṭhi uddhacca anottappehi lobha moha diṭṭhi thina oddhacca anottappehi lobha moha māna oddhacca anottappehi

original: lobhamohamānathinauddhaccānottappehi, lobhamohathinauddhaccānottappehi, lobhamohauddhaccānottappehi,
analyzed: lobha moha māna thinā auddhacca anottappehi lobha moha thinā auddhacca anottappehi lobha moha auddhacca anottappehi

original: dosamohauddhaccānottappehi, dosamohathinauddhaccānottappehi, mohavicikicchāuddhaccānottappehi,
analyzed: dosa moha auddhacca anottappehi dosa moha thina auddhacca anottappehi moha vicikicchā auddhacca anottappehi

original: mohauddhaccānottappehi ca ekato uppajjati. Anottappaṃ lobhamohadiṭṭhiuddhaccāhirikehi,
analyzed: moha auddhacca anottappehi ca ekatas uppajjati anottappam lobha moha diṭṭhi uddhacca āhirikehi

original: lobhamohadiṭṭhithinauddhaccāhirikehi, lobhamohamānauddhaccāhirikehi, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccāhirikehi,
analyzed: lobha moha diṭṭhi thina auddhacca ahirikehi lobha moha māna auddhacca ahirikehi lobha moha māna thina auddhacca ahirikehi

original: lobhamohathinauddhaccāhirikehi, lobhamohauddhaccāhirikehi, dosamohauddhaccāhirikehi,
analyzed: lobha moha thina auddhacca ahirikehi lobha moha auddhacca ahirikehi dosa moha auddhacca ahirikehi

original: dosamohathinauddhaccāhirikehi, mohavicikicchāuddhaccāhirikehi, mohauddhaccāhirikehi
analyzed: dosa moha thina auddhacca āhirikehi moha vicikicchā auddhacca āhirikehi moha auddhacca āhirikehi

original: ca ekato uppajjatīti evamettha mānādīnampi ekato uppatti veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: ca ekatas uppajjati iti evam ettha māna ādīnam pi ekatas uppatti veditabbā sesam uttāna attham eva

original: Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti dhammasaṅgaṇīmūlaṭīkāya līnatthapadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: iti dhammasaṅgaṇī mūla ṭīkāya līnattha pada vaṇṇanā

original: Dhammasaṅgaṇī-anuṭīkā samattā.
